name: Kombi Brave Socks (Twin Pack) - Children to Youths
description: Be a winter hero at the ski hill, in the snow fort or while waiting for the bus.  feels soft and comfy, and the knee height provides lots of coverage under boots.Hybrid cushioning with support through the arch and ankle.Ribbed cuffs help hold them in place.Reinforced toe and heels offer great durability.Convenient pack of 2 pairs.
